items.summary: Fix and complete canister upgrade lifecycle plumbing in `backend/main.mo` so wallet-domain state is safely persisted across upgrades and routed through `Migration.run(...)` during `system func postupgrade()`, while keeping all existing public APIs and method signatures backward-compatible (RBAC, user profiles, organization, Stripe, and existing wallet query methods).

Add or update `backend/migration.mo` to export a stable `run(...)` entrypoint that accepts the pre-upgrade wallet-domain state `{ wallets; walletTransactions; walletEvents }` and returns the post-migration wallet-domain state in a forward-compatible structure suitable for later Activity 2 organization-scoping steps.
